newsitem.title: ESTONIA: BOURSE CLOSING - TALSE SOFTENS BUT VOLUME PICKS UP.
newsitem.headline: BOURSE CLOSING - TALSE SOFTENS BUT VOLUME PICKS UP.

text.p: * Preliminary data from the Estonian bourse on Tuesday put
total trade at 37.6 million kroons versus 33.1 million kroons
* The Talse online index lost 0.48 percent to close at
252.07. (See index on stock exchange web site:
* Early data shows Hoiupank was the most active
stock in trade of 15.6 million kroons to close 0.40 kroons
kroons lower at 130.90 kroons with a volume of 4.6 million
